Owner.name: Eldon Elm
Owner.physicalDescription: Tall and slender with piercing green eyes

WagonMaster.name: Thom Lightfoot
WagonMaster.physicalDescription: Small and quick, with a mischievous smile
WagonMaster.secret: Is a wanted man in three cities
WagonMaster.magicalPower: Can become invisible once a day

details.description: Enchanted shield that surrounds the wagon, absorbing up to 50 damage from any direction.
Mystic runes painted on the sides of the wagon, deterring evil spirits and ill intentions.

Teamster.name: Borin Flatfoot
Teamster.physicalDescription: Short, stout, with a jolly face and a thick beard
Teamster.motivation: Loves the open road and the thrill of travel
Teamster.secret: Secretly dreams of finding a legendary lost city

Coachman.name: Mirela the Swift
Coachman.physicalDescription: Tall, lithe, with sharp eyes and long silver hair
Coachman.motivation: Seeking stories and songs for her homeland
Coachman.secret: Is a spy for an elven kingdom

Footman.name: Tomas Grubb
Footman.physicalDescription: Medium height, muscular, with a friendly face and a quick smile
Footman.motivation: Working to send money back to his family
Footman.secret: He once was a noble, now fallen from grace

Passengers.name: Arianna of the Winds
Passengers.physicalDescription: Slender, with piercing blue eyes and hair that seems to flow like water
Passengers.motivation: In search of an ancient artifact to enhance her powers
Passengers.secret: The artifact is cursed, and she knows it

Passengers.name: Dorn Ironfist
Passengers.physicalDescription: Broad and tough, with countless battle scars and a braided beard
Passengers.motivation: Hunting a notorious bandit leader who raided his clan
Passengers.secret: He is the rightful heir to a dwarven throne

Passengers.name: Eloise Merryweather
Passengers.physicalDescription: Petite, with curly hair and an ever-present smile, carrying a lute
Passengers.motivation: To write the greatest ballad the world has ever known
Passengers.secret: Her songs can enchant people to tell the truth

Passengers.name: Sir Reginald Blackthorn
Passengers.physicalDescription: Tall and imposing, with a stern face and a voice that commands attention
Passengers.motivation: On a quest to slay a dragon that terrorizes the countryside
Passengers.secret: He fears his courage will falter when he faces the dragon
Passengers.destination: The fiery mountains of the East

Owner.name: Cedric the Seafarer
Owner.physicalDescription: Rugged, weather-beaten skin with keen gray eyes
Owner.motivation: To chart the unexplored northern territories
Owner.secret: Possesses a map to a hidden undersea city
Owner.flaw: Obsessed with finding the city at any cost

WagonMaster.name: Fiona Firehand
WagonMaster.physicalDescription: Slim, with fiery red hair and piercing green eyes
WagonMaster.motivation: In search of ancient arcane knowledge
WagonMaster.secret: Her magic comes from a pact with a mysterious entity
WagonMaster.flaw: Her curiosity often leads her into danger

Cargo.name: Enchanted Crystals
Cargo.description: Crystals that glow with an inner light, rumored to have healing properties

details.description: A magical barrier that can deflect arrows and minor spells.

Teamster.name: Olaf Stonearm
Teamster.physicalDescription: Stocky, with a long beard intertwined with gems
Teamster.motivation: To prove his worth outside his mountain home
Teamster.secret: He was once a renowned gladiator

Coachman.name: Liliana of the Veil
Coachman.physicalDescription: Mysterious, always cloaked, with a hidden face
Coachman.motivation: Seeking redemption for a dark past
Coachman.fear: Her past catching up with her

Footman.name: Erik Swiftwind
Footman.physicalDescription: Lean and graceful, with a serene demeanor
Footman.motivation: To explore the world beyond the elven forests
Footman.secret: He is a prince in exile

Passengers.name: Zara the Wise
Passengers.physicalDescription: Ethereal beauty with wisdom in her eyes
Passengers.motivation: To find the lost library of Nelathar
Passengers.secret: She possesses one of the keys to the library

Passengers.name: Thorn Underleaf
Passengers.physicalDescription: Small and wiry, with a sly grin and quick hands
Passengers.motivation: In search of the greatest theft
Passengers.secret: Is actually a noble acting as a rogue
Passengers.destination: The vaults of the Dwarven kings
